attributes.action: We want the Government to commit to roll out a vaccination passport
attributes.additional_details: It would show that there is also a demand for this to happen rather than all the objectors gaining the publicity it would show that as a country we are happy for this to happen
attributes.background: We want the Government to commit to roll out a vaccination passport to the British public. This will help the country to get back to normal quicker and prevent the spread of Coronavirus

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575297
